chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (A : Set) (x : Map A), maxi bool lem (ensemble_base A x) (map_maxi A x)

Premises:
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
lem = fix lem (m0 m1 : Map bool) {struct m1} : Prop := match m0 with | @M0 _ => match m1 with | @M0 _ => True | _ => False end | @M1 _ a b => match m1 with | @M1 _ a' b' => if (a =? a')%N then leb b b' else False | _ => False end | @M2 _ a b => match m1 with | @M2 _ c d => lem a c /\ lem b d | _ => False end end : Map bool -> Map bool -> Prop
ensemble_base : forall A : Set, Map A -> Map bool -> Prop
map_maxi : forall A : Set, Map A -> Map bool
Inductive Map (A : Type) : Type := M0 : Map A | M1 : ad -> A -> Map A | M2 : Map A -> Map A -> Map A For Map: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M0: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M1: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _] For M2: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
maxi : forall A : Set, mRelation A -> mEnsemble A -> Map A -> Prop
map_mini_mini : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A), mini bool lem (ensemble_base A x) (map_mini A x)
map_maxi_appartient : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A), ensemble_base A x (map_maxi A x)
map_mini_appartient : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A), ensemble_base A x (map_mini A x)
dist_concat_m : forall (A : Set) (x y : Map A) (z : prechain A), x <> y -> dist_chain A (concat A z x) -> dist_chain A (concat A (concat A z x) y)
Inductive non_dist_chain (A : Set) : prechain A -> Prop := non_dist_concat_s : forall x : Map A, non_dist_chain A (concat A (single A x) x) | non_dist_concat_m_hd : forall (x : Map A) (z : prechain A), non_dist_chain A (concat A (concat A z x) x) | non_dist_concat_m_tl : forall (x y : Map A) (z : prechain A), non_dist_chain A (concat A z x) -> non_dist_chain A (concat A (concat A z x) y) For non_dist_chain: Argument scopes are [type_scope _] For non_dist_concat_s: Argument scopes are [type_scope _] For non_dist_concat_m_hd: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _] For non_dist_concat_m_tl: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ _ _]
Inductive dist_chain (A : Set) : prechain A -> Prop := dist_single : forall x : Map A, dist_chain A (single A x) | dist_concat_s : forall x y : Map A, x <> y -> dist_chain A (concat A (single A x) y) | dist_concat_m : forall (x y : Map A) (z : prechain A), x <> y -> dist_chain A (concat A z x) -> dist_chain A (concat A (concat A z x) y) For dist_chain: Argument scopes are [type_scope _] For dist_single: Argument scopes are [type_scope _] For dist_concat_s: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ _] For dist_concat_m: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ _ _ _]
chain_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : mEnsemble A -> mRelation A -> prechain A -> Prop), (forall (x : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T x -> P T r (single A x)) -> (forall (x y : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T x -> T y -> r x y -> P T r (concat A (single A x) y)) -> (forall (x y : Map A) (z : prechain A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T y -> r x y -> chain A T r (concat A z x) -> P T r (concat A z x) -> P T r (concat A (concat A z x) y)) -> forall (m : mEnsemble A) (m0 : mRelation A) (p : prechain A), chain A m m0 p -> P m m0 p
Inductive chain (A : Set) : mEnsemble A -> mRelation A -> prechain A -> Prop := chain_single : forall (x : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T x -> chain A T r (single A x) | chain_concat_s : forall (x y : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T x -> T y -> r x y -> chain A T r (concat A (single A x) y) | chain_concat_m : forall (x y : Map A) (z : prechain A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T y -> r x y ->...-> chain A T r (concat A (concat A z x) y) For chain: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ _] For chain_single: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ _ _] For chain_concat_s: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ _ _ _ _ _] For chain_concat_m: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _]
lem_transitive = fun x : Map bool => Map_ind bool (fun x0 : Map bool => forall y z : Map bool, lem x0 y -> lem y z -> lem x0 z) (fun y : Map bool => Map_ind bool (fun y0 : Map bool => forall z : Map bool, lem (M0 bool) y0 -> lem y0 z -> lem (M0 bool) z) (fun z : Map bool => Map_ind bool (fun z0 : Map bool => lem (M0 bool) (M0 bool) -> lem (M0 bool) z0 -> lem (M0 bool) z0) (fun _ _ : lem (M0 bool) (M0 bool) => I) (fun (a : ad) (a0 : bool) (_ : lem (M0 bool) (M0 bool)) (H0 : lem (M0 bool) (M1 bool a a0)) => False_ind (lem (M0 bool) (M1 bool a a0)) H0) (fun (m : Map bool) (_ : lem (M0 bool) (M0 bool...
ad_alloc_opt_allocates : forall (A : Set) (m : Map A), in_dom A (ad_alloc_opt A m) m = false
ad_alloc_opt_allocates_1 : forall (A : Set) (m : Map A), MapGet A m (ad_alloc_opt A m) = None
lem_antisymmetric = fun x : Map bool => Map_ind bool (fun x0 : Map bool => forall y : Map bool, lem x0 y -> lem y x0 -> x0 = y) (fun y : Map bool => Map_ind bool (fun y0 : Map bool => lem (M0 bool) y0 -> lem y0 (M0 bool) -> M0 bool = y0) (fun _ _ : lem (M0 bool) (M0 bool) => eq_refl) (fun (a : ad) (a0 : bool) (H : lem (M0 bool) (M1 bool a a0)) (_ : lem (M1 bool a a0) (M0 bool)) => False_ind (M0 bool = M1 bool a a0) H) (fun (m : Map bool) (_ : lem (M0 bool) m -> lem m (M0 bool) -> M0 bool = m) (m0 : Map bool) (_ : lem (M0 bool) m0 -> lem m0 (M0 bool) -> M0 bool = m0) (H1 : lem...
lazy_power_eg_power : forall (A : Set) (egalite : Map A -> Map A -> bool) (f : Map A -> Map A) (x : Map A) (n : nat), (forall a b : Map A, egalite a b = true <-> a = b) -> lazy_power A egalite f x n = power (Map A) f x n
iteres_ult_const_4 : forall (A : Set) (f : Map A -> Map A) (x : Map A) (n : nat), non_dist_chain A (iteres A f x n) -> exists p : nat, S p <= n /\ power (Map A) f x p = power (Map A) f x (S p)
lem_reflexive = fun x : Map bool => Map_ind bool (fun x0 : Map bool => lem x0 x0) I (fun (a : ad) (a0 : bool) => eq_ind_r (fun b : bool => if b then leb a0 a0 else False) (leb_reflexive a0) (N.eqb_refl a)) (fun (m : Map bool) (H : lem m m) (m0 : Map bool) (H0 : lem m0 m0) => conj H H0) x : r_reflexive bool lem
MapFlag_sum : forall (A : Set) (f : MapFlag A), exists x : Map A, f = flag_true A x \/ f = flag_false A x
map_fill : forall A : Set, Map A -> bool -> Map bool
iteres_ult_const_3 : forall (A : Set) (p : prechain A), non_dist_chain A p -> iteres_ult_const_def_0 A p
map_mini : forall A : Set, Map A -> Map bool
MapEmptyp : forall A : Type, Map A -> bool
lazy_power_eg_power_0 : forall (A : Set) (egalite : Map A -> Map A -> bool) (f : Map A -> Map A) (x : Map A) (n : nat), (forall a b : Map A, egalite a b = true <-> a = b) -> forall z : Map A, (lazy_power_aux A egalite f x n = flag_true A z -> z = power (Map A) f x n /\ z = f z) /\ (lazy_power_aux A egalite f x n = flag_false A z -> z = power (Map A) f x n)
MapDisjoint_1 : forall A B : Type, Map A -> Map B -> bool
MapSubset_1 : forall A B : Type, Map A -> Map B -> bool
in_dom : forall A : Type, ad -> Map A -> bool
ad_alloc_opt_optimal_1 : forall (A : Set) (m : Map A) (a : ad), Nleb (ad_alloc_opt A m) a = false -> {y : A | MapGet A m a = Some y}
ad_alloc_opt_optimal : forall (A : Set) (m : Map A) (a : ad), Nleb (ad_alloc_opt A m) a = false -> in_dom A a m = true
MapPut_canon : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), mapcanon A m -> forall (a : ad) (y : A), mapcanon A (MapPut A m a y)
MapFold_orb : forall (A : Type) (f : ad -> A -> bool) (m : Map A), MapFold A bool false orb f m = match MapSweep A f m with | Some _ => true | None => false end
MapSubset_Merge_l : forall (A : Type) (m m' : Map A), MapSubset A A m (MapMerge A m m')
MapPut_as_Merge_c : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), mapcanon A m -> forall (a : ad) (y : A), MapPut A m a y = MapMerge A m (M1 A a y)
alist_of_Map_sorts : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), alist_sorted A (alist_of_Map A m) = true
ad_list_of_dom_card : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), length (ad_list_of_dom A m) = MapCard A m
makeM2_M2 : forall (A : Type) (m m' : Map A), eqm A (MapGet A (makeM2 A m m')) (MapGet A (M2 A m m'))
MapCard_Dom : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), MapCard A m = MapCard unit (MapDom A m)
Elems_of_list_of_dom : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), eqmap unit (Elems (ad_list_of_dom A m)) (MapDom A m)
MapMerge_canon : forall (A : Type) (m m' : Map A), mapcanon A m -> mapcanon A m' -> mapcanon A (MapMerge A m m')
MapCard_makeM2 : forall (A : Type) (m m' : Map A), MapCard A (makeM2 A m m') = MapCard A m + MapCard A m'
MapCard_ext : forall (A : Type) (m m' : Map A), eqm A (MapGet A m) (MapGet A m') -> MapCard A m = MapCard A m'
MapPut_as_Merge : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A) (a : ad) (y : A), eqmap A (MapPut A m a y) (MapMerge A m (M1 A a y))
MapEmptyp_complete : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), MapEmptyp A m = true -> m = M0 A

```intros. apply chain_ind.
- intros. apply chain_single. apply map_mini_appartient.
- intros. apply chain_concat_s; try apply map_mini_appartient. simpl. apply lem_reflexive.
- intros. apply chain_concat_m; try apply map_mini_appartient; try apply lem_transitive.
  + apply lazy_power_eg_power_0.
```
